NAME: Serverdash
TAGLINE: Order (a picture of) anything (within reason) from your Discord server! Powered by real life humans!

HELP_COMMAND.COMMAND_DESCRIPTION: Learn about & get help with the bot
HELP_COMMAND.BODY:
{tagline}
Join the kitchen if you want to help fill orders, or if you need any help.

ORDER_COMMAND.ORDER_OPTION_DESCRIPTION: What would you like to order? - 1 reasonable item per order :)
ORDER_COMMAND.ORDER_IN_THREAD_ERROR: Due to Discord limitations, you can't order in a thread. Sorry!
ORDER_COMMAND.ORDER_INVITE_PERMISSIONS_ERROR: I don't have permission to create invites! How do you expect your order to be delivered without that?
ORDER_COMMAND.ORDER_CHANNEL_PERMISSIONS_ERROR: I don't have permission to read messages in this channel! I need this to update you on your order.
ORDER_COMMAND.SENDING_DESCRIPTION: Sending your order to the kitchenâ€¦
ORDER_COMMAND.SENDING_FOOTER: This message will be updated with the status of your order.
ORDER_COMMAND.EXISTING_ORDER_ERROR_TITLE: You already have an active order!
ORDER_COMMAND.BANNED_ERROR_DESCRIPTION:
{message}

You may appeal your ban starting {appealTimestamp}. Otherwise, it will expire {expireTimestamp}.
